name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
description: A little app that I made as part of an Arthur Dent fancy-dress costume.

name: Tartan-ify
description: A tool to analyse patterns within a piece of musc. Most of the patters end up looking like tartan which is where it gets its name!
